name: Cyber City: Sector 7
description:
Cyber City: Sector 7 is in early alpha development heavily inspired by upcoming game Cyberpunk 2077, developed by one developer. This game is heavily focused on fighting combos. The story is about  gang war between two gangs in area called Sector 7.  Sector 7 is forgotten place where crime rate is getting out of the control. You playing as Brute a gang member from different sector is headed out to this area to kill enemy gang.  This game was made mainly to create a full working game from one year learning game development in Unity and show off what I've learned in this year. This game was in development for about 2 months I've designed the city ,  program game play, designed UI and also created story but the main goal was to showcase my programming skills and of course learn new things . 

Thank you for playing.
